name: A Little Push From My Bullet
name_original: A Little Push From My Bullet
description:
Work In Progress (If somehow I find the time to do it before the deadline):
Wave System
Menu
Tutorial
Sound

TEMPORARY HOW TO PLAY:
Left Click to Shoot.
Keep Left Click pressed to control bullet.
Release Left Click to stop bullet.
Right Click to slow down time.

Hit enemies to kill them.
Hit yourself to move.

Considerations:
I think the better approach to the bullet pushing the player would be to transfer the bullet speed at impact to the player, so it always moves the player in the direction the bullet was flying. Right now what i'm doing is calculating the point of impact and pushing the player alway from it, resulting sometimes in correct but confusing results.

Game being made for the Novice Summer Jam.

Everything is being made from scratch on Unity/Aseprite during the jam!
